data.title: Walmart has this Nintendo Switch Animal Crossing bundle on sale for its lowest price of the year — so far
authors: Dawn Magyar | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
data.meta_description: Walmart has the Nintendo Switch Lite Animal Crossing Bundle on sale for its lowest price of the year so far. Here's the big online deal to shop at Walmart.
data.text:
Walmart has a sweet deal on the Nintendo Switch Lite Animal Crossing: New Horizons Bundle that drops the price of the console and popular video game to its lowest price of the year.

The Nintendo Switch Lite Animal Crossing Bundle is now on sale for $179, instead of $200, for a savings of $21. This low sale price automatically applies when added to your cart.

This is the cheapest price we’ve found so far this year on this Nintendo Switch Bundle at Walmart.

For this deal, the Switch Lite gaming console includes the full game download of Animal Crossing: New Horizons, which Walmart said has a $60 value.

The console comes in the turquoise colorway with an Aloha theme, that features a white leaf pattern on the back to match the Animal Crossing desert island adventure game included. It also includes a lightweight design and compact footprint for easy handheld use. Up to eight players can play the device wirelessly or online.

Walmart is also offering free next-day shipping with the purchase of this Nintendo Switch Lite Bundle, depending on location.

Shop for this Nintendo Switch Lite Animal Crossing Bundle at Walmart here.

You can also check out these Nintendo Switch game deals from Walmart, including these top offers:

Mario Kart 8 Deluxe, Nintendo Switch Game for $40, instead of $49

The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom Game for $51, instead of $70

Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Game for $49, instead of $60

Bluey: The Videogame for $28, instead of $40

Save on even more gaming consoles and accessories from Walmart online here.
